title: Very happy
body: Upgraded to this from the iPhone X! Love it

title: camera is amazing
body: like always video and camera are top notch on iPhones literally! the battery is ok not great but not bad I would say its good.photos turn out phenomenal videos are very stable the speakers pack a punch and are really excellent in sound very high quality!

title: amazing
body: was so glad i purchased this, was a bit sceptical buying this since it said the box may be damaged, but buying from amazon warehouse was the best thing i’ve ever done. saved almost £200 on the brand new phone from apple, and the only thing different was the original box was slightly damaged

title: Nice white
body: iPhone is what it is. Always had them but only upgrade every few years. My last one was an XR. Choose the white and very happy with it.

title: Really bad quality
body: bought the iPhone14 two months ago and it has been nothing but a headache. The phone constantly lags, it's slow to respond to commands, and it frequently turns on and off by itself.The touch screen is unresponsive and it's frustrating to use. To make matters worse, the phone gets warm super easily, which makes it uncomfortable to hold for extended periods of time. Overall, I'm very disappointed with this Amazon product and regret purchasing the iPhone 14. I wouldn't recommend this phone to anyone looking for a reliable and high-performance device."

title: Excellent phone
body: Great saving on price compared to other outlets

title: Excellent
body: A great upgrade from the SE (2020). The battery is excellent, and the cameras certainly make this phone worth it.

title: Excellent phone
body: Item was as expected for iPhone

title: Randomly Opens Apps
body: This replaced my XS which wasn’t very good either. My husband has the same phone and these issues are prevalent with both: screen judders when scrolling; poor photo quality compared to the 11 (which he had previously), randomly opens apps which suggests touch screen super sensitivity. It’s fast though and the battery lasts about 14 hours.

title: Lovely phone
body: Bought for my daughter afer he hand me down IPhone SE gen1 gave up. It was old! It is a nice phone. It is lighter than my IPhone 14 Pro Max which I do like. The camera is of good quality but the Pro/Pro Max cameras are a lot better. Ideal for the younger members of the family. I personally would recommend the Pro/Pro Max if you like taking pictures.

title: Good phone
body: I’ve had iPhones since the iPhone 4 was released still love them!

title: Ipnone
body: Disappointing looks . Expensive for what it is

title: Nice phone
body: As expected and for great price

title: It's an IPhone
body: I can't complain. It's an upgrade from the IPhone SE, so I can't be happier. Battery life is good (about 24hs if you don't binge watch series on it), sounds good and feels good

title: Apple rule!
body: Years of devotion to Samsung but for 4 years now have converted to Apple. NEVER GOING BACK.
